verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [יְדִיתוּן כ] (יְדוּת֗וּן <S%H3038><s%> Jeduthun ק) לְאָסָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm קוֹלִ֣י <S%H6963><s%> with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> unto God וְאֶצְעָ֑קָה <S%H6817><s%> I cried קוֹלִ֥י <S%H6963><s%> with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> [even] unto God וְהַאֲזִ֥ין <S%H238><s%> and he gave ear אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> in

בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day צָרָתִי֮ <S%H6869><s%> of my trouble אֲדֹנָ֪י <S%H136><s%> the Lord דָּ֫רָ֥שְׁתִּי <S%H1875><s%> I sought יָדִ֤י ׀ <S%H3027><s%> my sore לַ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night נִ֭גְּרָה <S%H5064><s%> ran וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without תָפ֑וּג <S%H6313><s%> and ceased מֵאֲנָ֖ה <S%H3985><s%> refused הִנָּחֵ֣ם <S%H5162><s%> to be comforted נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> not my soul

אֶזְכְּרָ֣ה <S%H2142><s%> I remembered אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God וְאֶֽהֱמָיָ֑ה <S%H1993><s%> and was troubled אָשִׂ֓יחָה ׀ <S%H7878><s%> I complained וְתִתְעַטֵּ֖ף <S%H5848><s%> was overwhelmed רוּחִ֣י <S%H7307><s%> and my spirit סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אָ֭חַזְתָּ <S%H270><s%> Thou holdest שְׁמֻר֣וֹת <S%H8109><s%> waking עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes נִ֝פְעַ֗מְתִּי <S%H6470><s%> I am so troubled וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> that I cannot speak
חִשַּׁ֣בְתִּי <S%H2803><s%> I have considered יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> the days מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <S%H8141><s%> the years עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <S%H5769><s%> of ancient times

אֶֽזְכְּרָ֥ה <S%H2142><s%> I call to remembrance נְגִינָתִ֗י <S%H5058><s%> my song בַּ֫לָּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with לְבָבִ֥י <S%H3824><s%> with mine own heart אָשִׂ֑יחָה <S%H7878><s%> I commune וַיְחַפֵּ֥שׂ <S%H2664><s%> made diligent search רוּחִֽי׃ <S%H7307><s%> and my spirit

הַֽ֭לְעוֹלָמִים <S%H5769><s%> alway יִזְנַ֥ח ׀ <S%H2186><s%> cast off אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> Will the Lord וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> add לִרְצ֣וֹת <S%H7521><s%> he be favourable עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again

הֶאָפֵ֣ס <S%H656><s%> clean gone לָנֶ֣צַח <S%H5331><s%> alway חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> Is his mercy גָּ֥מַר <S%H1584><s%> fail אֹ֝֗מֶר <S%H562><s%> promise לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> age וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> age

הֲשָׁכַ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> forgotten חַנּ֣וֹת <S%H2589><s%> to be gracious אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> Hath God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or קָפַ֥ץ <S%H7092><s%> shut up בְּ֝אַ֗ף <S%H639><s%> ? hath he in anger רַחֲמָ֥יו <S%H7356><s%> tender love סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

וָ֭אֹמַר <S%H559><s%> And I said חַלּ֣וֹתִי <S%H2470><s%> This [is] my infirmity הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> I שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <S%H8141><s%> [but I will remember] the years יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> of the right hand עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> of the most High

[אַזְכִּיר כ] (אֶזְכֹּ֥ור <S%H2142><s%> shall remember ק) מַֽעַלְלֵי־ <S%H4611><s%> the works יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely אֶזְכְּרָ֖ה <S%H2142><s%> surely I will remember מִקֶּ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old פִּלְאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6382><s%> thy wonders
וְהָגִ֥יתִי <S%H1897><s%> I will meditate בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6467><s%> also of all thy work וּֽבַעֲלִ֖ילוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H5949><s%> of thy doings אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <S%H7878><s%> and talk

אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [is] in the sanctuary דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1870><s%> Thy way מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> What אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> a God גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> who [is so] great כֵּֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You הָ֭אֵל <S%H410><s%> Thou [art] the God עֹ֣שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> that doest פֶ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> wonders הוֹדַ֖עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> thou hast declared בָעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> among the people עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5797><s%> thy strength

גָּאַ֣לְתָּ <S%H1350><s%> redeemed בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> Thou hast with [thine] arm עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְיוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

רָ֘א֤וּךָ <S%H7200><s%> saw מַּ֨יִם ׀ <S%H4325><s%> The waters אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> thee O God רָא֣וּךָ <S%H7200><s%> saw מַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters יָחִ֑ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> thee they were afraid אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> also יִרְגְּז֥וּ <S%H7264><s%> also were troubled תְהֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> the depths

זֹ֤רְמוּ <S%H2229><s%> poured out מַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H4325><s%> water עָב֗וֹת <S%H5645><s%> The clouds ק֭וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a sound נָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> sent out שְׁחָקִ֑ים <S%H7834><s%> the skies אַף־ <S%H637><s%> yet חֲ֝צָצֶ֗יךָ <S%H2687><s%> thine arrows יִתְהַלָּֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> also went abroad

ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice רַעַמְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H7482><s%> of thy thunder בַּגַּלְגַּ֗ל <S%H1534><s%> [was] in the heaven הֵאִ֣ירוּ <S%H215><s%> lightened בְרָקִ֣ים <S%H1300><s%> the lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> the world רָגְזָ֖ה <S%H7264><s%> trembled וַתִּרְעַ֣שׁ <S%H7493><s%> and shook הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

בַּיָּ֤ם <S%H3220><s%> [is] in the sea דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <S%H1870><s%> Thy way [וּשְׁבִילֶיךָ כ] (וּֽ֭שְׁבִֽילְךָ <S%H7635><s%> path ק) בְּמַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> in the great וְ֝עִקְּבוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H6119><s%> and thy footsteps לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נֹדָֽעוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> are not known

נָחִ֣יתָ <S%H5148><s%> Thou leddest כַצֹּ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> like a flock עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְּֽיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron
